Traits.Name: Adaptive Camouflage
Traits.Content: The Data Spider can blend into its surroundings, giving it advantage on Stealth checks when in electronic environments.

Traits.Name: Information Gathering
Traits.Content: The Data Spider can analyze and interpret data streams, allowing it to gain insights on creatures and objects it observes.

Actions.Name: Data Spike
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage as it extends a sharp data probe. On a hit, the target must make a DC 11 Intelligence saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. The target becomes disoriented, reducing its next attack roll by 2.

Actions.Name: Evasive Firewall
Actions.Content: Defensive Skill: The Data Spider can activate a protective protocol, granting it a +2 bonus to AC and advantage on Dexterity saving throws for 1d4 turns. This state ends if the Data Spider makes an attack or if it receives damage from an attack.
